empty.title: AI Health Assistant
empty.subtitle:
I'm here to support your mental health.
Share your feelings!

welcome.intro: Based on your emotions, I have some suggestions:
welcome.question: What would you like to discuss?

empty.title: No conversations yet
empty.subtitle: Start a conversation with your friends

floating.sadness: You seem {{intensity}} sad, I have some advice for you.
floating.anger: You seem {{intensity}} frustrated, let me help you.
floating.fear: Are you {{intensity}} worried? I can support you.
floating.joy: So happy to see you {{intensity}} joyful! Share more!
floating.surprise: Something surprising? I have some suggestions for you.
floating.neutral: I have {{count}} AI suggestions for you.

errors.selectFriend: Please select at least one friend
errors.createFailed: Failed to create conversation. Please try again.

ai.toxicMessage: This message contains potentially offensive content. Please be kind.
ai.extremelyToxic: This message is extremely inappropriate and cannot be sent.
ai.toxicConfirm: This message may be offensive. Are you sure you want to send it?

encryption.waitMessage: Please wait for encryption to initialize before sending messages.
encryption.retryMessage: Do you want to retry decrypting this message?
encryption.retryFailed: Still unable to decrypt this message. The sender may need to send it again.

empty.title: No messages yet
empty.subtitle: Send your first encrypted message to start the conversation

actions.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? Messages will only be deleted on your side.
actions.leaveGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave this group?
actions.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from the group?
actions.transferAdminConfirm: Are you sure you want to transfer admin rights to {{name}}?

video.privateMessage: Do you want to start a video call with {{name}}?

audio.privateMessage: Do you want to start an audio call with {{name}}?

photos.subtitle: Access photos and videos on device

alert.title: Permission Required
alert.message: Please go to Settings to enable {permission} permission

granted.title: Permission Granted
granted.message: {permission} permission has been granted. To change it, please go to System Settings.

language.title: Choose Your Language
language.description: Select your preferred language to continue

slide1.title: End-to-End Encryption
slide1.description: Your conversations are protected with military-grade encryption. Only you and your contacts can read your messages.

slide2.title: AI Emotion Analysis
slide2.description: Our intelligent AI analyzes your emotional state through messages and calls, providing personalized support and insights.

slide3.title: Emotional Balance Support
slide3.description: Get real-time counseling and recommendations to maintain your emotional wellbeing throughout your conversations.

securityScreen.title: Security
securityScreen.info: Manage your account security, password, and active sessions across all devices.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.info: Choose a strong password to keep your account secure. Make sure it's different from your current password.

validation.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.number: Password must contain at least one number
validation.same: New password must be different from current password

error.generic: Failed to change password. Please try again.

sessions.title: ACTIVE SESSIONS

signOutCurrent.title: Sign Out?
signOutCurrent.message: Are you sure you want to sign out from this device? You'll need to sign in again.

signOutOther.title: End Session?
signOutOther.message: This will sign out this device from your account.

signOutAll.title: Sign Out All Other Devices?
signOutAll.message: This will end {count} active sessions on other devices.

noOtherSessions.title: No Other Sessions
noOtherSessions.message: You're only signed in on this device.

sessions.signOutError: Failed to end session. Please try again.
sessions.signOutAllError: Failed to end sessions. Please try again.

loadError.title: Error
loadError.message: Failed to load sessions. Please try again.

requests.title: Friend Requests
requests.emptyDescription: You don't have any pending friend requests
requests.noResultsDescription: Try searching with a different name

backup.title: Secure Your Messages
backup.description: Create a backup password to recover your encrypted messages on other devices or if you reinstall the app.
backup.hint: Use a password you won't forget. You'll need it to restore messages.
backup.skipWarning: Without a backup, you'll lose all messages if you reinstall the app or switch devices.
backup.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
backup.recommendMessage: We recommend creating a backup password to protect your encryption keys. This will allow you to recover your messages if you lose your device.
backup.createForExistingDescription: Create a backup password to protect your existing encryption keys

restore.title: Restore Your Messages
restore.description: Enter your backup password to restore your encrypted messages and continue your conversations.
restore.info: This is the password you created when you first set up encryption. If you've forgotten it, you'll need to start fresh.
restore.startFreshWarning: This will create new encryption keys. You won't be able to read your old messages. Are you sure?
restore.invalidPassword: Invalid password or corrupted backup data. Please try again.
restore.success: Your messages have been restored successfully!
